name: Bruno Cesar
message: I started training Jiu Jitsu here a few weeks ago and couldn't be happier with my choice. The beginner classes provide the right guidance and practice to improve my techniques. The environment is amazing—everyone is kind, respectful, and helpful. Highly recommend this place for anyone thinking about starting Brazilian Jiu Jitsu! #OSS

name: Kamila Duranti
message: As a woman, I was initially hesitant to try BJJ, but the Women's Only classes at Athlete A have been amazing. The instructors are patient and encouraging, and I've made great friends here.

name: Taiane Vieira da Silva
message: I was welcomed by a supportive community that helped me learn and improve under passionate instructors. I've made genuine friendships with amazing people who share my love for the sport. This gym is more than a training space—it's a place to grow as a fighter and person. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to engage in this sport and join a special community!

name: Joao Viana
message: Since my first day at the trial , everybody was super friendly and helpful. Adriano the professor is amazing , calm to teach and easy going . Nice and clean structure.

name: Brian O'Regan
message: Great place to learn Jiu-jitsu, Adriano is very patient and all the more experienced guys take time to show the the fundamentals.. I am grateful for all the valuable lessons I've learned here, not just about jiu-jitsu but also about life.

name: James Doran
message: Great gym. Spotlessly clean, knowledgable instructors, and friendly environment.
